name: companies_id_events
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool german_company_data_v2.
Tool description: Enrich your CRM / MAS / ERP system with credible data about all incorporated companies from  Germany.
API description: This endpoint returns the latest events about the company with the given identifier since the given timestamp. This timestamp is optional and is specified via a query parameter. Events come with a type (companies' register event, blog article, press release, etc.), a category (change in management, finances, merger/acquisition, etc.), a text (the content of the event), a source, and a timestamp.

is_id.description: The unique identifier of the company.

category.description: The category of events to filter by (default is 'MANAGEMENT_AND_TEAM,FINANCES_AND_CAPITAL,NEWS_AND_EVENTS').

since.description: The start date for fetching events in YYYY-MM-DD format (default is '2017-01-01').

size.description: The number of events to retrieve (default is 100).
